title: Item I Have NEVER Seen
body:
Ermahgerd what is this, All i know is that its called the raptor cloak but i've never seen it in game in any gamemode. :s Is it going to be an item released later or what? {{item:2053}}

Edit: Just found out what it was :PP But still i have never seen this item, EVER

replies.body: Raptor clock that builds into new Ohmwrecker. It is also part of the recipe for the new Zzrot Portal item that is soon to come out.
